Type.Name: NotifyEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NotifyEventHandler(object sender, NotifyEventArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: NotifyEventHandler is a delegate object that can be used to notify your program whenever a key's value is changed, either in your program or externally (i.e. via gconf-editor).
